<p class=box>
**CONSTANTS** (dependent on time constant $\tau$):^(a)^   
\footnote{}  
$a=\frac{2\pi}{\tau}$, 
$a_{2}$=$a\ e^{-a/2}(\cos(a\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}})+\sqrt{\frac{1}{3}}\sin(a\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}}))$,
$a_{3}$=2$e^{-a/2}$$\cos(a\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}})$, $a_{4}$=$e^{-a}$  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
^(a)^ For processing prior to the 2014, the factor $\sqrt{\frac{3}{2}}$
was erroneously $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$.  
</p>
<p class=box2><code>
\ // input x = unfiltered signal<br />
\ \ \ // output returned is low-pass-filtered input<br />
\ \ \ // tau determines the cutoff<br />
\ \ \ // zf[] saves values for recursion<br />
\ \ \ zf[2] = -a * x + a2 * zf[5] + a3 * zf[3] - a4 * zf[4];<br />
\ \ \ zf[1] = a{*}x + a4{*}zf[1];<br />
\ \ \ zf[4] = zf[3];<br />
\ \ \ zf[3] = zf[2];<br />
\ \ \ zf[5] = x;<br />
\ \ \ return(zf[1] + zf[2]);
</code>
</p>
